Description: Parchment codex leaf with two columns of Sahidic Coptic text on each side (34 lines). The text contains a portion from the Book of Jeremiah (Jer. 22:4-20), which is otherwise unattested in Sahidic. The upper margins are paginated 213-214.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: H. Behlmer, U. Pietruschka, and F. Feder, Ägypten und der Christliche Orient - Peter Nagel zum 80. Geburtstag (Texte und Studien zur koptischen Bibel 1; Wiesbaden: Harrassowitz, 2018), 77-84.
Provenance unknown; acquired as part of 400 fragments, many of which may be interrelated.
Bibliographic references: Schüssler 1995 / Biblia Coptica Die koptischen Bibeltexte (2.1) (p. 66)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (244012) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/244012)
